Name: Adventure Mosaics. Granny’s Farm
About the game: Adventure Mosaics - Granny's Farm Deluxe takes a sunny stroll down memory lane. Help Ellie and her grandmother get the family farm back in working order! Charming music will transport you in this pleasant summer story. Solve 200 colorful nonogram puzzles with multiple difficulty levels. Restore the farm to its full charm in the Adventure Mosaics - Granny's Farm! A pleasant summer story, and charming music will help you pass the time and have a lot of fun! Puzzles are a great opportunity to challenge yourself! Complete levels, solve puzzles, and help repair Granny's farm! - 200 colorful and memorable levels! - Striking visual effects! - Repair the farm! - An exciting adventure! - Rich summer colors! - Improve your logical and abstract thinking! - User-friendly interface and addictive gameplay!
